attributes.action: allow the culture of Spain to enter UK society. Relax, enjoy and live.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Spain are laid back, friendly and very passionate. We should try to invoke this into British society as there is much less drink induced violence. They are a tolerant society. Make it compulsory for every British person to visit Spain at least once and learn to enbrace its warm friendly culture.Learn the language.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
